# ENTITY::GET_ENTITY_ALPHA

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity: Uses only on entities using SET_ENTITY_ALPHA, use with care as it can get rather expensive.

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Return the alpha of an entity
